Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for lens flares.

texId.Wiki: The texture to use for this lens flare.

isFlare.Wiki: If ON, this lens flare is treated as a flare. If OFF, then it is a ghost.

enableRoll.Wiki: If ON, this lens flare can be rotated.

enableScale.Wiki: If ON, this lens flare can be scaled.

locateDistRate.Wiki: The placement distance rate. 0 is the light source position, 1 is the centre of the screen.

texScale.Wiki: The scale to apply to the lens flare texture.

colR.Wiki: The red component of the RGBA color used with the lens flare texture.

colG.Wiki: The green component of the RGBA color used with the lens flare texture.

colB.Wiki: The blue component of the RGBA color used with the lens flare texture.

colA.Wiki: The alpha component of the RGBA color used with the lens flare texture.
